## validSpiderMoves() function

Get all valid moves for the tile at the given coordinate acting as a spider.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validSpiderMoves(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

## Remarks

The spider rules state that a spider moves exactly three spaces per turn. It must move in a direct path and cannot backtrack on itself. I may only move around pieces it is in direct contact with on each step of its move and it may not move across to a piece that it is not in direct contact with.
